name: University
description: University talks are on Monday and Tuesday and are in-depth session of 2 x 75 minutes.

name: Conference
description: Conference talks start on Wednesday till Friday and are our one hour technical presentations.

name: BOF
description: Informal evening sessions of 1 hour with maximum 70 people per room.

name: Quickie
description: 15 minute sessions during the lunch breaks.

name: Tools in Action
description: 30 minute sessions taking place after the University talks with a focus on technical tools and APIs.

name: Labs
description: Practical hands-on sessions of 3 hours (in the BOF rooms) with maximum 50 people per room.
